title: Image segmentation using Detectron2
description: Image segmentation using Detectron2Using Detectron2 and mask R-CNN it is possible to isolate each leaf from the input image and extract the most prominent one for later analysis.Steps involved: Download and install detectron2 and other dependancies  Hand annotate images with the objects mask (not covered in this kernel) - google "labelme" and "training detectron2 on custom dataset"  Train detectron2 (not covered in this kernel)  Load pretrained weights into detectron2  Infer image masks and identifiy prominent objects  Mask and extract from original image  Crop and rotate object to fit     To Do: Futher training of the mask R-CNN model to improve segmentation.
description_lemmatized: image segmentation using detectron2using detectron2 mask rcnn possible isolate leaf input image extract prominent one later analysissteps involved download install detectron2 dependancies hand annotate image object mask covered kernel google labelme training detectron2 custom dataset train detectron2 covered kernel load pretrained weight detectron2 infer image mask identifiy prominent object mask extract original image crop rotate object fit futher training mask rcnn model improve segmentation
